=*How to Use*=
  # Create an account at http://www.myepisodes.com/
  # Add all of your favorite TV shows.
  # For correct episode air dates/times select GMT and enter the offset on the MyEpisodes.com Control Panel
    * For example: -5 for CDST or -6 for CST.
  # If you experience any trouble with the gadget not updating, please try clearing your browser cache first before filing a bug via the [https://code.google.com/p/my-episodes-2-ical/issues/ Issues] tab.
